metadata.synopsis: Avatar Laezel must pick between siding with Voss and helping Orpheus or siding with Vlaakith's Inquisitor in helping them kill Orpheus. They both lead to a fight with the opposing party.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Go to sleep at the INT camp. Plays automatically after the Voss Ambush scene if Laezel is avatar.

32.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
32.text: |I apologize for causing damage to your camp. I made sure no one is harmed.|

18.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
18.text: |I need the artefact that you carry. The whole fate of the our race depends on it.|

3.speaker: Player
3.text: [DID CRECHE]  |I visited the Creche nearby. You're following Vlaakith's orders too.|

0.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
0.text: |Vlaakith.. You couldn't be farther from the truth.|

30.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
30.text: |I am the one who fought with our Prince, and the one who failed and doomed us to tyranny.|

39.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
39.text: |If there is a small part of you that wonders who you would be without the Queen and her foul codes, if you have ever dreamt of Prince Orpheus, we can bring him to life.|

22.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
22.text: |We escaped slavery before, but we still think like slaves.|

33.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
33.text: |What you have is the solution that will free us. It imprisons the Prince in the shooting star: Orpheus. We are a revolution.|

7.speaker: Player
7.text: [DID ASTRAL PRISON] |Orpheus? It's Daisy the one in there, you're mistaken.|

28.speaker: Player
28.text: |Who is Orpheus, what the hell are you going on about?|

2.speaker: Player
2.text: |I want to help you, but I cannot give away this artefact easily.|

37.speaker: Narrator
37.text: |*You suddenly feel weak and your head stings with sharp pain... As the moment passes, you start feeling normal again.*|

19.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
19.text: |What was that? What are you not telling me?|

31.speaker: Narrator
31.text: |*Suddenly a portal opens and a few Githyanki exit out of it and move to surround the party.*|

12.speaker: a4df3a1d-0c32-4548-acfe-5e45b1886671
12.text: |Not a step further. Hand over the artefact.|

34.speaker: a4df3a1d-0c32-4548-acfe-5e45b1886671
34.text: |You're the one who killed W'Wargaz. Such treachery also hides strength.|

23.speaker: a4df3a1d-0c32-4548-acfe-5e45b1886671
23.text: |Vlaakith is willing to give you another chance.|

25.speaker: a4df3a1d-0c32-4548-acfe-5e45b1886671
25.text: |I recall your name, Lae'zel. An outstanding pupil, pride of the crèche K'liir. You're a true follower of Gith.|

5.speaker: a4df3a1d-0c32-4548-acfe-5e45b1886671
5.text: |Don't be swayed by this traitor. Thanks to Gith himself, our people are the world's conquerors.|

10.speaker: a4df3a1d-0c32-4548-acfe-5e45b1886671
10.text: |Serving Vlaakith is an honor and duty.|

26.speaker: a4df3a1d-0c32-4548-acfe-5e45b1886671
26.text: |Your time has ended, Voss. You've been under our watch for long, and your treachery ends now.|

21.speaker: a4df3a1d-0c32-4548-acfe-5e45b1886671
21.text: |Lae'zel. Kill the traitor. Your Queen is watching you closely.|

8.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
8.text: |Don't listen to her! Orpheus is the only way forward!|

16.speaker: Narrator
16.text: |*Serving your Queen... or helping free Orpheus.*|

20.speaker: Narrator
20.text: |*You can't help but think this decision might shape up the future of your people.*|

11.speaker: a4df3a1d-0c32-4548-acfe-5e45b1886671
11.text: |You will die now. *Casts a spell on the dragon*. Kill them, Dragon!|

15.speaker: a4df3a1d-0c32-4548-acfe-5e45b1886671
15.text: |Very good. Follow your orders and kill the traitor. I will enjoy the spectacle.|

6.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
6.text: |You are making a grave mistake. Vlaakith will bring our people to ruin!|

29.speaker: a4df3a1d-0c32-4548-acfe-5e45b1886671
29.text: |Vlaakith's inquisitors have been keeping track of you.|

13.speaker: Player
13.text: |A githyanki revolution? That has nothing to do with me, please leave.|

24.speaker: Player
24.text: [ALREADY MET VOSS] |We already met once, Kithrak Voss. We've been over this already.|

9.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
9.text: |I think we didn't start off with the right foot. Let me introduce myself.|

4.speaker: Player
4.text: |Why is everyone so desperate for this artefact?|

40.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
40.text: |It imprisons the one who'll save us from Vlaakith.|
